"The Incapacitation Menu":
"When your HP reaches 0, you will become incapacitated.
While incapacitated, you are unable to move or attack.
You are only able to use the Incapacitation Menu, which is displayed to incapacitated players.

â€»After you have been incapacitated for too long, enemies defeated nearby will not award you EXP or drop items for you until you are revived."
"The Incapacitation Menu gives you a number of options. You can return to the nearest Ryuker Device, use an N-Scape Doll to revive on the spot, or stay where you are and chat with other players."
